properties.name: Chișinău
properties.why_notable: Capital, Soviet architecture, parks, wine bars, surprisingly lively

properties.name: Orheiul Vechi
properties.why_notable: Cave monastery in dramatic gorge, ancient settlements, Moldova's top sight

properties.name: Mileștii Mici
properties.why_notable: World's largest wine cellar (200km tunnels), 2 million bottles, Guinness record

properties.name: Cricova Winery
properties.why_notable: Underground wine city, 120km tunnels, Putin & Merkel's private collections

properties.name: Tiraspol (Transnistria)
properties.why_notable: Unrecognized Soviet time capsule, Lenin statues, own currency, surreal
